about_the_game:
don't touch the Purple

Don't Touch the Purple ("DTTP") is an endless side-scrolling arcade platformer where you make your way through a randomly generated assortment of levels and get as far as possible before dying. While you're running, an inevitable purple wall of death will slowly creep in from the left getting faster and faster as time goes on. You'll have to be quick to outrun it or it may spell the end for you.

Multiple Unique Modes

The game features 3 distinct modes with countless levels each. Making sure to spice up your game each and every time. You can obtain unlocks regardless of which mode you're playing on, so feel free to play whichever mode you think is the most fun.

Color Palettes

As you play, you'll unlock color palettes to choose from. These will let you change the color scheme of the game to your heart's content. The more you play, the more you'll unlock, so you can wear your colors like a badge of honor.

movies.name: Press V to jump and X to dash

name: Don't Touch the Purple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-650
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not Needed
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game will pretty much run on almost anything.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
